state: Welcome to another fast paced episode of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First stop, move south. And then, make an effort to venture west. With that done, pick up the shadfly from the plate inside the cookhouse. Got that? Good! -= Canteen =- You are in a canteen. A typical one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west. > -= Canteen =-0/1
next_state: -= Dish-Pit =- You've entered a dish-pit. Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a board. Now why would someone leave that there? But there isn't a thing on it. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Dish-Pit =-0/2
